events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle collided with my parked car.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the submitted description involving a car collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will assist throughout the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and have started processing it.
Please submit photos of the damaged car, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and repair quotes have been uploaded for review.
An investigation into the circumstances of the car accident has commenced to verify all details provided.
The investigation confirmed the collision details and liability as described in the claim documents.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on assessed damages and reviewed repair costs to your vehicle.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the support provided.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, ensuring timely payment for necessary vehicle repairs.
The settlement payment for your vehicle damage has been issued to your designated bank account today.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment and completion of all procedures.
All case documents and details regarding your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
